data.name: Sounds of Her Love ~We'll always be together~
data.detailed_description:
Story


Continuing on with your 'new life', side by side with the girl who'd caught your heart. Join her as you begin another new day together, embraced by each other's feelings.

As a blooming relationship continues to grow skyward, live another day of your youthful live at an 'international' school, now hand in hand with a flustered, timid Ceri. What starts as another seemingly idyllic chapter of life, soon shifts to a world full of questions as two students begin a new experience together.

Notes


This 'visual novel' was developed in two weeks to commemorate the first anniversary of it's parent game 'Sounds of Her Love'. For the full experience, it is recommended to play the first installment of the series.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimální:
  • Operační systém: Windows XP or Newer
  • Procesor: 1.5 GHz or Better
  • Paměť: 2 GB RAM
  • Grafická karta: Intel Integrated Graphics Chipset
  • Pevný disk: 2 GB volného místa
  • Dodatečné poznámky: If you can't run this, how are you running Steam?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimální:
  • Operační systém: Sierra
  • Procesor: 1.5 GHz or Better
  • Paměť: 2 GB RAM
  • Grafická karta: Integrated Graphics
  • Pevný disk: 2 GB volného místa
  • Dodatečné poznámky: If you can't run this, how are you running Steam?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimální:
  • Operační systém: Post 2012 Linux OS
  • Procesor: 1.5 GHz or Better
  • Paměť: 2 GB RAM
  • Grafická karta: Integrated Graphics
  • Pevný disk: 2 GB volného místa
  • Dodatečné poznámky: If you can't run this, how are you running Steam?
